vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.24.15
§ Hezir = "swine"
1) a priest in the time of David, leader of the 17th monthly course
2) one of the heads of the people who sealed the covenant with Nehemiah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   sacerdote; en tiempos del rey David; (b)   hombre; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
希悉 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "豬"
1)大衛王年間的一個祭司, 每月輪班第十七班次的領袖 ( #代上24:15)
2) 與尼希米立約的一個人民領袖( #尼10:20)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
希悉 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "猪"
1)大卫王年间的一个祭司, 每月轮班第十七班次的领袖 ( #代上24:15)
2) 与尼希米立约的一个人民领袖( #尼10:20)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.10.20
§ Hezir = "swine"
1) a priest in the time of David, leader of the 17th monthly course
2) one of the heads of the people who sealed the covenant with Nehemiah
